titles: A brief account of some of the late incroachments and depredations of the Dutch upon the English and of a few of those many advantages which by fraud and violence they have made of the British nations since the revolution, and of the means enabling them thereunto.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
notes: Attributed to Robert Ferguson by Wing and NCU pre-1956 imprints.
Imprint suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained with print show-through; cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  William and Mary, 1689-1702.
